Chinese.name: Ckafka消息上传到 COS
Chinese.description: 本示例通过配置 Ckafka 触发器，从 Ckafka 接收到消息后，写入文件并上传到 COS 中
Chinese.attention: 需要配置 Ckafka 触发器，并在 COS 中创建一个 bucket

English.name: KafkaMsgToCOS
English.description: This function will collect message from ckafka, then upload it to cos
English.attention: You need to config ckafka trigger and create your bucket in cos
